title: What is better PlayStation Now vs Playstation Plus? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both totally different subscriptions, PlayStation plus lets you play games online as well as other benefits like discounts and 2 free games a month. And PlayStation now is a catalog of PlayStation games past and present that streams to your console. (if your internet speed isn’t the best it may cause some button delay) overall in my opinion ps plus is the best as most games are more enjoyable when you play online.

PlayStation plus is better, why? It costs lessYou get 2 games every monthYou need a really fast internet for ps nowIn ps now first you have to get the subscribtion and then you have to buy other games.Thank you👍
